title: Home

messier.name: Messier
messier.description: A web app for managing Messier astronomy games, helping users explore, organize, and enjoy challenges based on Messier objects.

sections.title: Users section home page
sections.description: The first page of the site. Includes links to enter the marathon and a list of marathons.

sections.title: Admin Panel Features
sections.description: Admin panel page. With the ability to manage users, teams, marathons, Messier objects, etc. Developed by payload.
